str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.
Lawlessness, iniquity, disobedience, sin. From anomos; illegality, i.e. Violation of law or wickedness.
Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From energes; to be active, efficient.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and echo; to hold down, in various applications.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).
